oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Mt. Zion CME Henderson: fieldnotes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mt. Zion Colored Methodist Episcopal Church
Fieldnotes of Mt. Zion CME Church. Notes provide a brief description of the location and the building.

Located in Henderson, Tennessee, Mt. Zion Colored Methodist Episcopal Church has a "very good 1960 building." The current building sits in an older African American neighborhood and down the street from Cool Springs Baptist Church. At the time of fieldwork, Willie Adams served as minister.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
